title: Coin Feed - News aggregator app for Crypto.
description: A news aggregator app that presents all that's going in the Crypto & Web 3 landscape in a sleek interface, letting you pick and choose your sources and re-arrange them based on your preferences. No ads, no bloat, just content in an intuitive interface.
tags: UI / UX, Development, React Native, Web3

title: Jeevan - Mental Health Awareness Campaign
description: Jeevan is a NGO based out of Jamshedpur, India that aims to reduce the stigma around mental health. I have been working with this NGO to design graphics for their social media outreach and related events and the project showcases some of them.

title: Online Portfolio
description: I built my last portfolio site when I was graduating college and wanted to update it to something that is more representative of my work. The project showcases the design reasoning & process involved and talks briefly about the development
tags: UI / UX, Web Design, Web Development

title: Ping Pong AI
description: I built a ping-pong game where you play against an AI bot that gets better with every level. This project walks you through the entire design process and talks briefly about the development details.
tags: UI / UX, Web Design, Web Development, Branding

title: Alpha & Omega
description: Identity design for Alpha & Omega, a trading company based out of Belize.

title: Watercolor Portraits
description: I picked up this hobby during the ongoing lockdown, trying to learn how to paint watercolor portraits. This is a collection of some of my paintings.

title: Digiup
description: Digiup is a digital content platform based out of Greece that offers digital up-haul services for businesses like hotels / restaurants and more. I was commissioned to design the identity for the brand.

title: Logofolio 2019 / 2020
description: A collection of logos I designed between 2019 - 2020.

title: Learning Motion Design
description: I am learning motion design and this collection showcases some of my work.

title: Sound Stash
description: A React app that enables it's users to search, play and download songs.

title: Watercolors
description: A collection of my watercolor paintings I made towards the end of 2019.

title: Logofolio 2018
description: A collection of branding work I undertook in the year 2018.
